front.title: Use of Composite ML-DSA in TLS 1.3

abstract.t: This document specifies how the post-quantum signature scheme ML-DSA [FIPS204], in combination with traditional algorithms RSA- PKCS#1v1.5,RSA-PSS, ECDSA, Ed25519, and Ed448 can be used for authentication in TLS 1.3. The composite ML-DSA approach is beneficial in deployments where operators seek additional protection against potential breaks or catastrophic bugs in ML-DSA.
